ComicInfo.Summary:
Sam Slade returns this prog for his second adventure - Day of the Droids. This time out he's joined by robo sidekick Hoagy.
Cover: Carlos Ezquerra (Fiends)/Ian Gibson (Robo-Hunter)
Sam Slade: Robo-Hunter - Day of the Droids (part 1) (John Wagner - Ian Gibson - Steve Potter)Judge Dredd - Blood of Satanus (part 1) (Pat Mills - Ron Smith - Tom Frame)Captain Klep - To the end of Time...and back!
